msbt.message: Finally feels like it wants to warm up! It's almost like my bones are thawing.Y'know, I was thinking of gearing up for some once the weather's right. Whaddaya think?
Whew! It is HOT out, . Which, yuckbut alright. But it's also MEGA humid!
How's fall treating you so far? I love this time of year. Cool temps, pretty trees, good food Sooo good!
Ugh The sun's out and it's STILL cold! C'mon, sun! Get back to work!I used to love winter. I was all about snow forts and snowball fights Now I'm all about some hot cocoa.
My flowers are practically beaming they're so happy. Spring's definitely here, !
One summer I caught a bunch of cicadas. I showed them to my mom and she screamed SOOO loudYeah, I'm pretty sure I know where I got my rock-star scream from, !
The days keep getting shorter, which suits me fine. Just means more night for me, !
The air's got a bite to it, I can see my breath, the days're short Yeah, this is PERFECT hot-cocoa weather.
See all the happy bugs crawlin' out of the ground, ? That's how you know it's warming up!
You gotta be real careful this time of year. The nights get super cold, so if you let your guard down, then <10_10 />BWAAACHOOO!<10_9 />Then that, basically, .
Maybe summer only seems hot because we say it's hot What if we all started saying it's cold instead?
When it's too hot to sleep, all you can do is stay up. I mean, I'd do that anyway, but now I'm kinda forced to!
What's your favorite part about fall, ? Mine's gotta be the food.I've got a recipe for covered in that I can't wait to force on someone!
Fall's easily my favorite season for ridin' a motorbike, .I'll find an old forest road, turn up the music, rev the engine, and blast through a tunnel of changing leaves!
My cheeks get so stiff in the winter cold that everyone starts telling me I have an accent,
When I was little, the snow would get me so excited that I'd turbo out without my jacket.Turns out a stout inner fire ain't a substitute for a warm, fuzzy coat. I really shoulda bundled up! Brrr!
